pages.index.jade:
from mixins import make_timeline
extends base.jade
block content
	.content
		.page-header: .box-blog-info
			a.avatar(href='/')
				img(src=site.site_avatar)
			.info
				h3.name= site.title
				.slogan= site.sub_title
	
		
		//Count				
		span= '%s篇文章，' %(d.get_data(types='post', return_count=true, with_page=false))
		span= '{0:,}'.format(site.text_words) + '字'

		entries = d.get_data(type='post',limit=300, sort='desc').group('-date:year')
		+make_timeline(entries)

	
		+h.paginator()
pages.mixins.jade:
mixin make_timeline(cated_posts)
	ul.post_list: for category, posts in cated_posts
		li.item_title
			dot_class = 'dot dot_%s'%loop.index
			span(style="background: {{h.get_a_color()}}", class=dot_class)
			category_title = category or 'UnCategory'
			span.category_title(id=h.get_dom_id(category_title))= category_title
			
		for post in posts
			li.item_post.item
				span.dot(style="background: {{h.get_a_color()}}")
				///span.post_date= post.date.format('%m-%d')
				span.post_date= post.date.format('%h, %d')
				
				a.post_title(href=post.url)= post.title

pages.category+categories.jade:
from mixins import make_timeline
extends base.jade
block content
	.content
		.page-header
			.box-blog-info
				a.avatar(href='/')
					img(src=site.site_avatar)
				.info
					h3.name= site.title
					.slogan= site.sub_title

		if posts.category
			all_posts = posts.list_obj
		else
			all_posts = get_data(type='post',limit=300, sort='desc')
		entries = all_posts.group('path:parent_path')
		+make_timeline(entries)

		+h.paginator()
